languages.text: {n}Передавая вам бокал, Джай задерживает свои пальцы на ваших.{/n} "Восславим глотком Великого, что зрит в глубины наших сердец и посылает нам то, о чем не догадываемся мечтать, но что нам более всего нужно".

{n}As she passes you the bottle, Jae's fingers close over yours.{/n} "Let us praise the Exalted One as we drink, He who sees into the depths of our hearts and sends us that which we never thought to dream of, but which we need more than anything."
languages.original_text: {n}Передавая вам бокал, Джай задерживает свои пальцы на ваших.{/n} "Восславим глотком Великого, что зрит в глубины наших сердец и посылает нам то, о чем не догадываемся мечтать, но что нам более всего нужно".

traits.locale_text: {n}As she passes you the bottle, Jae's fingers close over yours.{/n} "Let us praise the Exalted One as we drink, He who sees into the depths of our hearts and sends us that which we never thought to dream of, but which we need more than anything."
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: {n}婕伊将瓶子递给了你，她的手指紧紧地盖着你的手指。{/n}“咱们一边喝酒，一边赞美至高无上的神皇吧。感谢祂洞察我们的灵魂深处，为我们带来了从来不敢奢望、而又迫切需要的东西。”
languages.original_text: {n}As she passes you the bottle, Jae's fingers close over yours.{/n} "Let us praise the Exalted One as we drink, He who sees into the depths of our hearts and sends us that which we never thought to dream of, but which we need more than anything."

traits.locale_text: {n}婕伊将瓶子递给了你，她的手指紧紧地盖着你的手指。{/n}“咱们一边喝酒，一边赞美至高无上的神皇吧。感谢祂洞察我们的灵魂深处，为我们带来了从来不敢奢望、而又迫切需要的东西。”
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: {n} 彼女がボトルを渡すと、ジェイの指があなたの指に重なる。{/n}「一杯やりながら、エグザルテッド・ワンを称えましょう。主は、あたしたち心の奥底を見抜き、夢にも思わなかった、それでもあたしたちが何よりも必要としているものを送ってくださるの」
languages.original_text: {n}As she passes you the bottle, Jae's fingers close over yours.{/n} "Let us praise the Exalted One as we drink, He who sees into the depths of our hearts and sends us that which we never thought to dream of, but which we need more than anything."

traits.locale_text: {n} 彼女がボトルを渡すと、ジェイの指があなたの指に重なる。{/n}「一杯やりながら、エグザルテッド・ワンを称えましょう。主は、あたしたち心の奥底を見抜き、夢にも思わなかった、それでもあたしたちが何よりも必要としているものを送ってくださるの」
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: {n}Según te pasa la botella, los dedos de Jae se cierran en torno a los tuyos.{/n} «Alabemos al Exaltado y bebamos. Ve las profundidades de nuestros corazones y nos envía aquello con lo que nunca soñamos, pero que necesitamos más que nada».
languages.original_text: {n}As she passes you the bottle, Jae's fingers close over yours.{/n} "Let us praise the Exalted One as we drink, He who sees into the depths of our hearts and sends us that which we never thought to dream of, but which we need more than anything."

traits.locale_text: {n}Según te pasa la botella, los dedos de Jae se cierran en torno a los tuyos.{/n} «Alabemos al Exaltado y bebamos. Ve las profundidades de nuestros corazones y nos envía aquello con lo que nunca soñamos, pero que necesitamos más que nada».
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: {n}En vous passant la bouteille, les doigts de Jae se referment sur les vôtres.{/n} « Louons l'Exalté tout en buvant, Lui qui voit dans les profondeurs de notre cœur et nous envoie ce dont nous n'aurions jamais osé rêver, mais dont nous avons tant besoin. »
languages.original_text: {n}As she passes you the bottle, Jae's fingers close over yours.{/n} "Let us praise the Exalted One as we drink, He who sees into the depths of our hearts and sends us that which we never thought to dream of, but which we need more than anything."

traits.locale_text: {n}En vous passant la bouteille, les doigts de Jae se referment sur les vôtres.{/n} « Louons l'Exalté tout en buvant, Lui qui voit dans les profondeurs de notre cœur et nous envoie ce dont nous n'aurions jamais osé rêver, mais dont nous avons tant besoin. »
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: {n}Jae reicht dir die Flasche und umschließt dabei deine Finger.{/n} "Preisen wir beim Trinken den Erhabenen. Er, der tief in unsere Herzen blickt und uns dann schenkt, was wir uns nie hätten träumen lassen, was wir aber mehr als alles andere brauchen."
languages.original_text: {n}As she passes you the bottle, Jae's fingers close over yours.{/n} "Let us praise the Exalted One as we drink, He who sees into the depths of our hearts and sends us that which we never thought to dream of, but which we need more than anything."

traits.locale_text: {n}Jae reicht dir die Flasche und umschließt dabei deine Finger.{/n} "Preisen wir beim Trinken den Erhabenen. Er, der tief in unsere Herzen blickt und uns dann schenkt, was wir uns nie hätten träumen lassen, was wir aber mehr als alles andere brauchen."
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.original_text: {n}As she passes you the bottle, Jae's fingers close over yours.{/n} "Let us praise the Exalted One as we drink, He who sees into the depths of our hearts and sends us that which we never thought to dream of, but which we need more than anything."

languages.text: {n}Jae, şişeyi sana uzatırken parmaklarını seninkilerin üzerine kapatıyor.{/n} "Kalplerimizin derinliklerini gören ve hayal bile edemeyeceğimiz ama her şeyden çok ihtiyacımız olanı bize gönderen Görkemli'yi anarak içelim."
languages.original_text: {n}As she passes you the bottle, Jae's fingers close over yours.{/n} "Let us praise the Exalted One as we drink, He who sees into the depths of our hearts and sends us that which we never thought to dream of, but which we need more than anything."

traits.locale_text: {n}Jae şişeyi sana uzatırken parmaklarını seninkilerin üzerine kapatıyor.{/n} "İçerken Görkemli'yi analım. Kalplerimizin derinliklerini gören ve hayal bile edemeyeceğimiz ama her şeyden çok ihtiyacımız olanı bize gönderen O."
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion
